title: Remove resource pools completely.
body:
Some champs have no resource pools of any kind. Others do.

Why this savage imbalance? It isn't as though the resourceless champs suffer from reduced damage output in order to make up for their ability to infinitely cast spells.

So why then should any champ have a resource pool of any kind?

Take yasuo and ziggs for example.

Yasuo is clearly casting spells in regards to his wind based bullshit kit, and yasuo players, you know your kit is bullshit. Ziggs on the other hand is simply throwing bombs, not casting spells of any kind what-so-ever.

So, if one champ, who suffers nothing from having a resourceless kit but is clearly casting spells, is allowed all the damage and mobility of an H-Bomb strapped to a jet engine... isn't it savagely imbalanced against champs who do suffer from resource intensive kits but clearly aren't casting spells...

Why not just remove all resource pools and make every champ cooldown based? It would certainly be more action packed and contribute to the E-Sports scene. No more should resource based champs be forced back while the yasuos and garens and katarinas of the world spam spells endlessly.
